ua.training

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.training.Controller

  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    Necklace creation controller. Helps user to create a number of stones for necklace.

        Parameters:

        pt - Pattern to match input.
        outputMsg - This message will be printed in the beginning.
        errorMsg - This message will be printed if input value doesn't match the specified pattern.
